__e: Manny didn't want to go, but I told him he'd never make any friends if he didn't.

"Hey, Manny, hand me that thing." That's my whole story.
Why does Manny give me so much shit all the time?
I mean, there's gals with special skills, but I got to pay extra. You should find someone who loves you the way Manny loves me.

No. Manny is the best thing that ever happened to me.
The only thing stronger than Manny's fear is his need to protect his mama.
